articles.author: Artem Golub and James Whitbrook
articles.title: Approaching Queerness in Doctor Who
articles.description: Doctor Who showrunner Russell T. Davies on writing queer stories in the popular cult sci-fi. series. Doctor Who streams on Disney+ Fridays.
articles.content:
Doctor Who showrunner Russell T. Davies on writing queer stories in the popular cult sci-fi. series. Doctor Who streams on Disney+ Fridays.
